text: The Wackiest Ship In the Army is a 1960 American World War II comedy movie directed by Richard Murphy and based on the 1956 story Big Fella Wash-Wash by Herbert Carlson. It stars Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, Chips Rattray, Tom Tully, John Lund and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was made into a TV series in 1965. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set on ships
title: The Wackiest Ship In the Army
